approval_data.project_summary: This project is a simple web application to manage a list of tasks

requirements.title: User Task Creation
requirements.description: The application shall allow a user to create a new task by providing a text description.

requirements.title: Task List Display
requirements.description: The application shall display a list of all created tasks.

requirements.title: Fast Loading Time
requirements.description: The application shall load quickly.

requirements.title: Secure Application
requirements.description: The application shall be secure.

requirements.title: Backend Task Storage
requirements.description: The application shall store the task descriptions.

extracted_requirements.title: User Task Creation
extracted_requirements.description: The application shall allow a user to create a new task by providing a text description.

extracted_requirements.title: Task List Display
extracted_requirements.description: The application shall display a list of all created tasks.

extracted_requirements.description: The application shall be secure.

original_functional_requirements.title: User Task Creation
original_functional_requirements.description: The application shall allow a user to create a new task by providing a text description.
acceptance_criteria: A text input field is provided for the task description.
A button or action is available to submit the task description.
Upon submission, the task description is saved and displayed in the task list.
Input validation is performed to prevent empty task descriptions.

original_functional_requirements.title: Task List Display
original_functional_requirements.description: The application shall display a list of all created tasks.
acceptance_criteria: The task list is displayed in a clear and readable format.
Each task description is visible in the list.
The list is updated immediately after a new task is created.
The list is displayed upon initial page load.

original_functional_requirements.title: Backend Task Storage
original_functional_requirements.description: The application shall store the task descriptions.
acceptance_criteria: Tasks are persisted across user sessions.
A database or other persistent storage mechanism is used.
Data integrity is maintained.

original_non_functional_requirements.title: Fast Loading Time
acceptance_criteria: The initial page load time shall be less than 3 seconds.
Subsequent interactions (e.g., adding a task) should feel responsive.
Optimize image sizes and other assets to minimize loading times.

original_non_functional_requirements.title: Secure Application
acceptance_criteria: The application uses HTTPS for all communication.
Input validation is implemented to prevent cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities.
Data is stored securely, preventing unauthorized access.
Regular security audits are performed.
